content: MT-CTAB Screw Grade 8.8 bolt with square washer used for assembling raised floor systems in dry, indoor environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster progress – longer screw shank simplifies handling, helping you get more done in less time Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Applications Assembling raised integrated floor systems (IFS) using Hilti MT strut and girders Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Q355 or better steel Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Weight: 0.1 lb. Technical Data | Material composition | Q355 or better steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2332797 - Screw MT-CTAB - Package Size 100 pc
